1.text: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

2.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they take for me an offering: of every man whose heart maketh him willing ye shall take my offering.

3.text: And this is the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass;

4.text: and blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair;

5.text: and rams’ skins dyed red, and sealskins, and acacia wood;

6.text: oil for the light, spices for the anointing oil, and for the sweet incense;

7.text: onyx stones, and stones to be set, for the ephod, and for the breastplate.

8.text: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

9.text: According to all that I shew thee, the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the furniture thereof, even so shall ye make it.

10.text: And they shall make an ark of acacia wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

11.text: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.

12.text: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four feet thereof; and two rings shall be on the one side of it, and two rings on the other side of it.

13.text: And thou shalt make staves of acacia wood, and overlay them with gold.

14.text: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings on the sides of the ark, to bear the ark withal.

15.text: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.

16.text: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.

17.text: And thou shalt make a mercy-seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

18.text: And thou shalt make two cherubim of gold; of beaten work shalt thou make them, at the two ends of the mercy-seat.

19.text: And make one cherub at the one end, and one cherub at the other end: of one piece with the mercy-seat shall ye make the cherubim on the two ends thereof.

20.text: And the cherubim shall spread out their wings on high, covering the mercy-seat with their wings, with their faces one to another; toward the mercy-seat shall the faces of the cherubim be.

21.text: And thou shalt put the mercy-seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.

22.text: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy-seat, from between the two cherubim which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.

23.text: And thou shalt make a table of acacia wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

24.text: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.

25.text: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an handbreadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.

26.text: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.

27.text: Close by the border shall the rings be, for places for the staves to bear the table.

28.text: And thou shalt make the staves of acacia wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.

29.text: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and the spoons thereof, and the flagons thereof, and the bowls thereof, to pour out withal: of pure gold shalt thou make them.

30.text: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.

31.text: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made, even its base, and its shaft; its cups, its knops, and its flowers, shall be of one piece with it:

32.text: and there shall be six branches going out of the sides thereof; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side thereof, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side thereof:

33.text: three cups made like almond-blossoms in one branch, a knop and a flower; and three cups made like almond-blossoms in the other branch, a knop and a flower: so for the six branches going out of the candlestick:

34.text: and in the candlestick four cups made like almond-blossoms, the knops thereof, and the flowers thereof:

35.text: and a knop under two branches of one piece with it, and a knop under two branches of one piece with it, and a knop under two branches of one piece with it, for the six branches going out of the candlestick.

36.text: Their knops and their branches shall be of one piece with it: the whole of it one beaten work of pure gold.

37.text: And thou shalt make the lamps thereof, seven: and they shall light the lamps thereof, to give light over against it.

38.text: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.

39.text: Of a talent of pure gold shall it be made, with all these vessels.

40.text: And see that thou make them after their pattern, which hath been shewed thee in the mount.
